comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: buckeye616: Thanks for the information on the three Flores Magon brothers who were involved in the Mexican Revolution. This website from the Autonomous University of Tamaulipas, Mexico identifies the man in the image as Jesus Flores Magnon: www.turevista.uat.edu.mx/galeria%20fotos.htm We will add this information to the description when we update.

comment._content:
Is this Ricardo Flores Magón, Mexican political writer and anarchist journalist? (1873-1922)

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: jerodamor, this is probably Jesus (note earlier comments).  Also, see full item record by clicking on  "Persistent URL" link.  Records in the Library of Congress online catalog will show edits first, then changes are loaded to Flickr.  In this case, fuller information appears in the Summary, which does not appear in Flickr.
